features.name: Schema-based Rendering
features.description: Automatically adapts to and renders table columns and filters based on a provided schema.

features.name: Complex Data Type Support
features.description: Handles various data types, including images, nested objects, collections, and temporal values.

features.name: Dynamic Cell Content
features.description: Customizable rendering of cell content based on schema-defined widget types.

features.name: Integrated Filtering and Sorting
features.description: Enables schema-defined filters and sorting capabilities for table data.

features.name: Pluggable Data Loader
features.description: Supports asynchronous data fetching with pagination and schema updates.

features.name: Row Selection and Click Handling
features.description: Allows rows to be selectable and handles row click events.

features.name: Filter Integration with SchemaFactory
features.description: Leverages `SchemaFactory` to dynamically render input elements in table filter cells.

props.name: loader
props.description: A custom class instance for managing data loading with methods for fetching rows and handling schema updates.

props.name: onRowClick
props.description: Callback function triggered when a table row is clicked, receiving the clicked row's data.

props.name: selectable
props.description: Determines if rows in the table are selectable by the user.

props.name: name
props.description: An identifier for the table, typically used for distinguishing between multiple tables.
